amendment.description: To make technical corrections to provisions of the bill related to verification of air carrier calendar year 2000 security costs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3586 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3586 proposed by Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S8951-8952; text: CR S8951-8952) To make technical corrections to provisions of the bill related to verification of air carrier calendar year 2000 security costs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3586 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3586 proposed by Senator Cochran.
